  • Constructor Details

    • Artist

      public Artist(String username, int age, String city)
      Constructs a new Artist with the specified username, age, and city. Initializes empty lists for events and merchandise, as well as an associated ArtistPage.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the artist.
      age - The age of the artist.
      city - The city where the artist is based.

  • Method Details

      Parameters:

      Adds a merchandise item to the artist's list of merchandise.
      Parameters:
      merch - The merchandise item to be added.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the artist is considered empty. In this context, an artist is never empty.
      Specified by:
      isEmpty in interface Playable
      Returns:
      false always, as an artist is never considered empty.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the artist's username.
      Specified by:
      getName in interface Playable
      Returns:
      The username of the artist.

    • isPlaylist

      public boolean isPlaylist()
      Checks if the artist is considered a playlist. In this context, an artist is not a playlist.
      Specified by:
      isPlaylist in interface Playable
      Returns:
      false always, as an artist is not a playlist.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(Library library)
      Adds this artist to the specified library's list of artists.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • handleDeletion

      public boolean handleDeletion(Library library)
      Handles the deletion process of the artist from the library. Ensures the artist is not currently being used or referenced before allowing deletion.
      Specified by:
      handleDeletion in class User
      Parameters:
      library - The library from which the artist will be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the artist can be safely deleted, false if the artist is currently in use.

    • handleSelect

      public void handleSelect(SearchBar searchBar, NormalUser user, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode out)
      Handles the selection process of the artist. Sets the artist's page as the current page for the user.
      Specified by:
      handleSelect in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      searchBar - The SearchBar used for the operation.
      user - The user who is selecting the artist.
      out - The output node where the result message is set.

    • hasEventWithName

      public boolean hasEventWithName(String eventName)
      Checks if the artist has an event with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event to search for.
      Returns:
      true if an event with the given name exists, false otherwise.

    • getEventWithName

      public Event getEventWithName(String name)
      Retrieves an event with the specified name from the artist's list of events.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the event to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The event if found, or null if no event with the given name exists.

    • ownedByUser

      public boolean ownedByUser(String artistName)
      Checks if the artist's name matches the specified artist name.
      Specified by:
      ownedByUser in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      artistName - The name of the artist to compare with.
      Returns:
